content: They call`em fingers, but I`ve never seen them fing.....oh there they go!
name: Otto the bus driver

content: Of all the things in me to admire, she picked my apathy. That`s disheartening.
name: Samuel Beckett

content: I use Instagram to compensate for my low self esteem is a bunch of words my therapist said.
name: Dom Mazzetti

content: Hummingbirds are a legal tender.
name: Charlie Kelly

content: Hell is other people.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

content: It depends on what the meaning of the word `is` is.
name: Bill Clinton

content: All that we see or seem is, but a dream within a dream.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

content: I told my dad about a dream I had and asked what it meant, he said `it means you were sleeping`.
name: Steven Wright

content: There he goes. One of God`s own prototypes. A high-powered mutant of some kind never even considered for mass production. Too weird to live, and too rare to die.
name: Raoul Duke
source: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas

content: The fact that we live at the bottom of a deep gravity well, on the surface of a gas covered planet going around a nuclear fireball 90 million miles away and think this to be normal is obviously some indication of how skewed our perspective tends to be.
name: Douglas Adams

content: Mrs. Krabappel and Principal Skinner were in the closet making babies, and I saw one of the babies, and then the baby looked at me.
name: Ralph Wiggum

content: Looking up into the night sky is looking into infinityâ€”distance is incomprehensible and therefore meaningless.
name: Douglas Adams
source: The Hitchhiker`s Guide to the Galaxy

content: Midway on our life`s journey, I found myself in dark woods, the right road lost
name: Dante Aligheri

content: I got a problem, can you relate?  I got a woman callin` love hate.
name: Eric Clapton

content: SERENITY NOW!
name: Frank Costanza

content: OMAHA!
name: Peyton Manning

content: Why was I born handsome instead of rich?
name: Ralph Cifaretto

content: It`s not easy to juggle a pregnant wife and a troubled child, but somehow I managed to fit in eight hours of TV a day.
name: Homer Simpson

content: Jerry, just remember:  It`s not a lie if you believe it.
name: George Costanza

content: Curiosity killed the cat, but for awhile, I was a suspect.
name: Steven Wright

content: Bumble Bee Tuna.
name: Ace Ventura

content: Hodor.
